name: Outro
_source: speak;Meta;Oh, shoot. I didn't see you there!
speak;Meta;(Or expected you to get to the end of the demo this fast);;;thought_bubble
speak;Meta;Hey, Meta here, lead writer for Touhou Emblem 2.|What you have just seen is a literary device called a "cliffhanger".
speak;Meta;For those who don't know: Cliffhanger - Noun. A story or-;no_block;hold
